query:
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT assigneeId) as assignees
FROM tasks 
WHERE projectId = 2723 
GROUP BY status
ORDER BY count DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute 
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT assigneeId) as assignees
FROM tasks 
WHERE projectId = 2723 
GROUP BY status
ORDER BY count DESC;
